page.title: 20P'BORO TECHNICAL COLLEGE.
page.content: The Technical College in Peterborough can be found next to the City's major park. It is a large building that offers a wide range of courses to students from all over the area. The college offers a number of academic, practical and technical courses to young people over the age of sixteen. Some of the most popular courses include plumbing, nursery nursing and typing. When surveyed most students enjoyed going to the technical college and liked the freedom that they were given. Some of the students interviewed spent four days a week training at work and then one day at college. The college is much bigger than most secondary schools and has many staff rooms, student rest rooms, cafes and a large library, It also has a large number of workshops.
